discord.header: Link Twitchat with Discord for an easier communication with your mods.
discord.install_code: Use {CMD} command on Discord, and enter the given code bellow
discord.install_confirm: Do you really want to link Twitchat with the following Discord server?
discord.reactions: Allow to react on messages received
discord.channel_logs: Discord chan to save chat messages to
discord.channel_logs_info:
To save a message on Discord, right click on it and click "{OPTION}" option.
Can be useful to keep a trace of toxic messages or users.
discord.chat_col: Chat columns in which messages received from Discord should be displayed
discord.quick_actions: Add quick actions usable by right clicking a message
